abstract: Discovery of ice on Hartley 2 that matches chemical composition of earth's oceans indicates earth's water may have been delivered by comets; study is published in journal Nature;
snippet: Scientists have found evidence that the water in the Earth’s oceans could have been delivered by comets.
lead_paragraph: Scientists have found evidence that the water in the Earth’s oceans could have been delivered by comets.

headline.main: A Delivery From Space That Made a Big Splash
headline.print_headline: A Delivery From Space That Made a Big Splash
